Santa's Girl:
Greetings, dear friend!
The New Year is just around the corner, and soon we will all gather around the holiday table to celebrate this wonderful family holiday!
To make the holidays happy, I have prepared a gift for you - the Magic Box. And in honor of the New Year, I exchange the usual Enchant Scrolls for Improved, Blessed and Stable - it's time to improve my equipment!
Dear friend! Thank you for your lively and sincere interest in the classic version of Lineage II. I wish you more enjoyment of the game in the New Year! May all your cherished dreams come true! Happy New Year!
The event will run from December 25 to January 10. Herb drops from monsters until January 10. Drop of herb at different times of the day: - x1 from 02:00 to 18:00 - x2 from 00:00 to 12:00 - x3 from 18:00 to 00:00 On January 10, the following items will be deleted: - Enchant Scroll Tickets - Santa Girl's Magic Box - Santa Girl's Gift Pouch All other items are saved after the event. Also, the Santa Girl's Gift effect will be removed.
Additionally, from December 25 to January 10, the time for rebirth of raid bosses will be reduced by 50%. Does not apply to epic bosses and bosses with a fixed time of rebirth.
